sqlMap.select: select b.rsv_seq AS rsv_seq, TO_CHAR(b.rsv_sdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS rsv_sdate, TO_CHAR(b.rsv_edate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS rsv_edate, b.rsv_room AS rsv_room, b.rsv_person AS rsv_person, b.rsv_name AS rsv_name, b.rsv_phone AS rsv_phone, b.rsv_pay_yn AS rsv_pay_yn, b.rsv_price AS rsv_price, b.rsv_payment AS rsv_payment, b.rsv_wdate AS rsv_wdate, (select a.rm_name from room_list A where A.rm_seq=B.rm_seq) as rm_name, (select a.rm_loc from room_list A where A.rm_seq=B.rm_seq) as rm_loc from reserve_list B
